title: Boots slash price of Fenty Beauty make up in huge autumn beauty sale
text:

For those of us who can't jet off to a tropical destination for glowing skin this winter, we needn't fret as Boots have launched major discounts on some its most popular makeup and skincare products.

The high street pharmacy chain recently kicked off its new promotional event, entitled 'The Big Deal' , that will see the store slash the price of one must-have product each week in the run up to the festive season.

Available both online and in store, the discounted items are expected to sell out very quickly - so you'll need to be fast.

First up is none other than a limited-edition palette from Rihanna's Fenty Beauty collection, which has been reduced from £39 to £19.50.

The Galaxy Eyeshadow Palette is part of Fenty Beauty's first ever Christmas range and boasts 14 space-inspired shades in different finishes.

(Image: Bloomberg)

The stunning sheer, smoky and shimmery colours are highly pigmented and have incredible staying power - this is one deal you don't want to miss out on.

Another item part in The Big Deal event is a Harry Potter The Dark Arts-Collectables Tin that is on offer for £20, allowing you to save on all kinds of products from the new Harry Potter range at Boots.

Each gift set contains selection of makeup, skincare and bath products inspired by characters from the popular Harry Potter saga.

Whilst the contents can vary slightly for each tin, shoppers can expect quirky pampering treats like a Lucius Malfoy Sheet Mask, Lord Voldemort Eye Shadow and a Cauldron Bath Fizzer.

If you're in the market for some reduced skincare, Boots has also cut the price of hundreds of No7 products.

Shoppers can save 25% on hydrating formulas, such as the Protect & Perfect Intense ADVANCED Day Cream (was £25, now £18.75) and the Lift & Luminate TRIPLE ACTION Serum (was £35, now £26.25), as well as selected No7 makeup products.

The health and beauty retailer even have a 15% discount on a selection of fragrances - including Yves Saint Laurent Mon Paris Eau de Toilette (was £60, now £36) and BOSS Bottled Unlimited Eau de Toilette (was £67, now £39).

Customers can receive free delivery on their haul if they spend over £45, otherwise it's £3.50.

If you're looking for more bargains, ASOS have launched a massive sale with up to 75% off dresses.
description: The health and beauty retailer has slashed prices on plenty of products, such as Fenty Beauty's Galaxy Eyeshadow Palette
